items.author: Nelson Mandela
items.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

items.author: Steve Jobs
items.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma â€“ which is living with the results of other people's thinking.

items.author: Anne Frank
items.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

items.author: Mother Teresa
items.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

items.author: Louis Stevenson
items.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

items.author: Helen Keller
items.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.

items.author: Dalai Lama
items.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

items.author: Marilyn Monroe
items.quote: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.

items.author: Winston S. Churchill
items.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

items.author: Napoleon Hill
items.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
